hymn.title: To Jesus Christ, the smitten Lamb

layout.singingstanza: To Je -- sus Christ, the smit -- ten Lamb, Raised to the heav'n by God Our glo -- rious Sav -- ior, sin -- ners' Friend, E -- ter -- nal praise and laud. Bless -- ed be the name, Bless -- ed be the name, Bless -- ed be the name of the Lord; Bless -- ed be the name, Bless -- ed be the name, Bless -- ed be the name of the Lord. Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! lyrics.stanza: To Jesus Christ, the smitten Lamb, Raised to the heav'n by God Our glorious Savior, sinners' Friend, Eternal praise and laud.

Blessed be the name, Blessed be the name, Blessed be the name of the Lord; Blessed be the name, Blessed be the name, Blessed be the name of the Lord. Hallelujah! Hallelujah! Blessed be the name of the Lord; Hallelujah! Hallelujah! Blessed be the name of the Lord.
The name surpassing ev'ry name, To Jesus has been giv'n; Soon shall all tongues confess Him Lord, On earth and in the heav'n.
The angels all shall prostrate fall, prostrate fall All creatures bow the knee, To worship the exalted Christ And praise the Lamb for aye.
All ransomed sinners, too, shall cheer And praise with one accord The Savior whose redeeming blood Eternal joy affords.
All wisdom, honor, glory, might, All wealth, authority, Be to the Lamb, our Savior, Christ, For all eternity.
